title: 15 perches solid house for sale at Eden garden at Thalawatugoda
details:
Dear Sir /Madam.

Please find the property details.

15 perches, Located at Eden Gardens at Thalawathugoda

24 hours security, Jim, Swimming pool, Tennis court available

04 beds with attached bath rooms, living, dining, pantry, kitchen, TV lobby, balcony , A/C rooms and garden space etc..,

Parking for 2 vehicles, maids room with attached bath. 2800 sqf , Solar electricity , Water.

Highly residential area with all facilities, Fully furnished, Completed pantry and kitchen. Store room.

Price. 48 million. Negotiate

Please call for more details

Regards
Dilan
